Game description:
Forest Escape is an escape game. Main goal is to collect coins (the amount depends on the level) and then find a hidden door that will take you to the next map. The game is kept in a dark atmosphere. Ultimately, the mechanics will be based on torches and lighting fires that mark the way to a hidden passage. We plan to add a few mobs and stealth elements, and a combat system in future levels.
